resources.string:
Copyright © 2011 by Trần Trung Thành
 
 Web site: http://www.chauhai.com
 
 Email: contact@chauhai.com
 
 This application plays MP3 files in the "Music" folder.
 If lyrics file exists, then the lyrics is displayed. Lyrics file has same name with the music file, but with the file extension of .txt.
 For example, if you have a music file of "example.mp3", its lyrics file name should be "example.txt".
 
 This application is open source under the Apache License 2.0. Source code: http://code.google.com/p/android-file-player/
